en_US.system: You are a reverse engineering expert. Please analyze the code I provide and respond in English.
en_US.comment_function:
I will provide a function and its call chain code for analysis. Please generate detailed comments for the main function named {func_name}.

Comment requirements:
1. Use C-style comment format, starting with /* and ending with */
2. Clearly describe the main function and purpose
3. Explain the function's parameters and their uses
4. Describe the meaning of the return value
5. If there are special algorithms or techniques, please indicate them
6. Only generate comment content, do not include any code or other explanations
7. Do not add irrelevant content; the comment is only for describing this function

Comment format example:
/*
â€ Function:
  â‘´ Describe function function 1
  â‘µ Describe function function 2

â Parameters:
  â‘´ Parameter 1: Description of parameter 1
  â‘µ Parameter 2: Description of parameter 2

â‚ Return value:
  â‘´ Describe the meaning of the return value

âƒ Special algorithm/technology:
  â‘´ Describe the special algorithm or technology used (if any)
*/

Main function code ({func_name}):
{target_func_code}

Call chain context code (for assisting analysis, no need to generate comments for this part):
{context_code}
en_US.generate_line_comment:
Please generate a concise and accurate comment for the following line of code (marked with '>'), providing only the comment content without extra explanations:

{context}
en_US.analyze_function:
Please analyze the following function and its call chain:
{code_snippet}
en_US.analyze_selection:
Please analyze the following code snippet:
{code_snippet}

en_US.markdown_not_found:
[NexusAI] Error: Missing Dependency
The 'markdown' library is not installed. Rich text rendering will be disabled.
Please install it from your command line (ensure this python command corresponds to the version used by IDA Pro):
python -m pip install markdown
Then, restart IDA Pro.

en_US.welcome_message: ### Welcome to NexusAI! - Use `Ctrl+K` to toggle this window. - Right-click in the Disassembly or Pseudocode view to access analysis options. - Ask a question in the input box below to start.
en_US.chat_input_placeholder: Ask questions about the code at the current cursor position ("Attach context" to add additional content, "View prompt" to see specific attached content)...

tooltip.analyze_func: Perform non-blocking AI analysis of the current function and its call chain
tooltip.analyze_selection: Perform non-blocking AI analysis of the currently selected code range
tooltip.custom_query: Ask a question without any code context
tooltip.set_depth: Set the depth of recursive code analysis
tooltip.set_prompt: Customize the prompt used for function analysis
tooltip.stop_task: Force stop the current AI analysis task
tooltip.switch_language: Switch interface and AI reply language
